name: Lana and the Milking Table
description:
You won a free all day massage and you think it's too good to be true. But you are in the area so you decide to check it out.

Inside you meet your masseuse Lana.

Now you really think it's too good to be true.

She's flirting with you... you must be dreaming.

She takes you back to your room...

This is gonna be one hell of a massage!


Lana and the Milking Table is a VN game made in Ren'py. There are a few choices you can make in regard to skipping some content that might not be up your alley, but the majority of the game focuses on the story of the main character as he gets a massage. The massage immediately turns lewd and a LOT of cumming is involved. There is a bit of an exploration with made up anatomical jargon (I know it's all unrealistic), and a lot of sensual talking and teasing.

After some time, the massage turns more fantastical and magical and more masseuses are introduced as a problem occurs that Lana needs to solve. If you have ever wondered what it would be like to have a milking table massage performed by a magically powered sexy woman, this game is for you!
